title: Channel Islands National Park: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth         Â    Be a Junior Ranger and help discover and protect the wonders of the islands.  The park and concessionaires offer many different programs for kids. Please click on the links above or visit For Teachers for more information. In addition, many programs listed in the Interpretive Programs are suitable for "kids" of all ages.   Student Information Are you preparing a report on the Channel Islands? The park site bulletins listed below provide information that will help you. The park site bulletins listed below also provide information to help children discover and protect the park.    Island Fox      Island Chumash      San Nicolas Island  (includes historical information that provided the basis for the novel Island of the Blue Dolphins)     Restoring Santa Cruz Island      Park Newspaper (link to park newspaper page)
